annotation: Generally means "to feel, to listen", "to hear", "to experience"This word means "to smell" when used with "odor" as it is represented below :tete         boo-xaman to smell odor-something
coded as a reflex of PMic *saŋu, but relies on irregular vowel changes and subsequent regular *ŋ > n /_i
